div.p: years should be expressed with four digits
Invalid date-time. The value specified must meet the Date and Time specifications as defined by RFC822, with the exception that the year should be expressed as four digits.
Additionally, the military time zones are specified incorrectly in RFC-822: they count the wrong way from UT (the signs are reversed). As such, they shoud be avoided.
